segments.text: Have you been feeling OK lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My coach wants you to check my blood pressure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has anyone ever told you that you had high blood pressure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t have any symptoms of high blood pressure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: People with high blood pressure seldom know they have it , which is why we call it the silent killer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What test do you do for high blood pressure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will pump air into this cuff to get a reading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you get the reading , what information does it give you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It tells me how hard your heart pumps blood and how much your arteries relax at rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am hoping that this test goes well for me .
segments.speaker: S2
